General.Name: Ranhill Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Ranhill Utilities Berhad, an investment holding company, operates in the environment and energy sectors. The company provides water supply services; operates water and wastewater treatment plants; and specialized and technical services in the management and optimization of water utility assets. It also offers source-to-tap water supply services to customers in Johor, Malaysia; and has water and wastewater concessions with a treatment plants outside Malaysia. In addition, the company is involved in the ownership and operation of two 190 MW combined cycle gas turbine power plants with 380 megawatts total electricity production capacity in Kota Kinabalu Industrial Park. Further, it provides engineering, procurement, and construction management (EPCM); engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning (EPCC); project management consultancy (PMC); and operation and maintenance services. The company was formerly known as Ranhill Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Ranhill Utilities Berhad in May 2020. Ranhill Utilities Berhad was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
